abstract.t: In an optical mesh network, two adjacent optical cross connects(OXCs) may have multiple, parallel, discrete bandwidth linksconnecting them [1]. When a link state routing protocol is used,these links may all be bundled together and advertised in a singlelink state advertisement (LSA). This draft describes therequirements, and proposes a method for bundling optical links. Theproposed method aims to reduce the number of routing adjacenciesbetween neighboring nodes, and works in conjunction with a linkmanagement protocol (e.g., LMP [2]). The discussion in this draft isrelated specifically to OSPF.
